Sentencas: We report on the synthesis and functional properties of nanoscale (similar to 50 nm) dense Y-doped zirconia (YDZ) electrolyte thin films by photon-assisted oxidation of Zr-Y precursor alloy thin films.
Titulo: Photon-assisted synthesis of ultra-thin yttria-doped zirconia membranes: Structure, variable temperature conductivity and micro-fuel cell devices

Sentencas: Crystalline zirconia films with grain size of similar to 5 nm were successfully grown at room temperature by oxidation under ultra-violet (UV) photon irradiation.
Titulo: Photon-assisted synthesis of ultra-thin yttria-doped zirconia membranes: Structure, variable temperature conductivity and micro-fuel cell devices

Sentencas: Microstructure of the films was characterized by transmission electron microscopy.
Titulo: Photon-assisted synthesis of ultra-thin yttria-doped zirconia membranes: Structure, variable temperature conductivity and micro-fuel cell devices

Sentencas: The electrochemical conductivity of UV grown YDZ electrolytes was investigated over a broad range of temperatures using Pt electrodes as a function of yttria doping concentration.
Titulo: Photon-assisted synthesis of ultra-thin yttria-doped zirconia membranes: Structure, variable temperature conductivity and micro-fuel cell devices

Sentencas: The slightly lower electrical conductivity in UV grown films at intermediate temperature range (400-550 degrees C) is consistent with previous reports on oxygen defect annihilation under photo-excitation.
Titulo: Photon-assisted synthesis of ultra-thin yttria-doped zirconia membranes: Structure, variable temperature conductivity and micro-fuel cell devices

Sentencas: Micro-fuel cells utilizing such ultra-thin YDZ membranes yielded similar to 12 mW cm(-2) power density at 550 degrees C.
Titulo: Photon-assisted synthesis of ultra-thin yttria-doped zirconia membranes: Structure, variable temperature conductivity and micro-fuel cell devices

Sentencas: The results are of potential relevance in advancing low temperature ultra-thin oxide membrane synthesis for energy applications.
Titulo: Photon-assisted synthesis of ultra-thin yttria-doped zirconia membranes: Structure, variable temperature conductivity and micro-fuel cell devices
Photon-assisted synthesis of ultra-thin yttria-doped zirconia membranes: Structure, variable temperature conductivity and micro-fuel cell devices
